item.title: Binance To Retire Deposit Addresses On BTC, BCH, LTC, XRP, ADA, DOGE Networks
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance to retire selected deposit addresses and memos in batches by networks in Q3. It is part of upgrading its wallet infrastructure to ensure better efficiency and fund security for its users. Some of the top network addresses planned for migration from July to September are Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, XRP,

item.title: Breaking: Shiba Inu’s Shytoshi Kusama Confirms Shibarium And Worldpaper Release Date

item.description:

item.title: BlackRock, Fidelity, And Spot Bitcoin ETF Applicants Meeting US SEC: Bloomberg Analysts
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
BlackRock, Fidelity Investments, and other spot Bitcoin ETF filers and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) will hold a meeting next week. The move comes after all spot ETF applicants have refiled their applications with the U.S. SEC, mentioning their surveillance-sharing partners and other required details. Spot Bitcoin ETF Applicants to Meet US SEC

The post BlackRock, Fidelity, And Spot Bitcoin ETF Applicants Meeting US SEC: Bloomberg Analysts appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Tiptoes Above $30.5k As FOMC Minutes Bite: ‘Mild’ Recession Looming in the US?
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Bitcoin price has all of a sudden faced a significant surge in selling pressure in the aftermath of June’s United States Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting minutes. The consensus among officials during the meeting leaned towards maintaining the current interest rates, though a few suggested a slight increment of 25 basis points. In the

item.description:
